Art. 4.141. 
Administrator 
The administrator referred to in Book 1, Title XI, Chapter II/1 of the former Civil Code and any person exercising a judicial mandate may not benefit from gifts that the protected person or the person in respect of whom the mandate is exercised could have made in their favour during the judicial protection or the mandate.
This provision does not apply to the persons referred to in article 496, paragraph 1, of the former Civil Code and in article 4.142, paragraph 3, 2¡ and 3¡.
